Boost Your Productivity with the Pomodoro Timer Plus- The Ultimate Time Management Extension

Struggling to stay focused and productive? The Pomodoro Timer Chrome Extension is designed to help you improve productivity and manage your time effectively using the proven Pomodoro Technique.

Key Features:

Simple Pomodoro Timer: Easily start and manage your sessions with a single click.
Customizable Breaks: Choose short (5 minutes) or long (10 minutes) breaks to fit your needs.
Daily Report: Track your productivity with detailed reports and visual charts.
Notifications and Alerts: Get notified when your session or break is over, even if the popup is closed.
Pause and Reset: Pause or reset the timer as needed for unexpected breaks.
Background Functionality: The timer runs in the background, letting you focus on your tasks.
Customizable Settings: Adjust Pomodoro and break times to suit your schedule.
Intuitive Interface: User-friendly design for easy time management.

How to Use:

Start a Pomodoro: Open the extension and click "Start Pomodoro." The timer counts down and shows remaining time over the icon.
Break Time: After the session ends, you'll be notified and redirected to a success page. Choose a short or long break.
Daily Report: Click "Daily Report" to view your productivity statistics with detailed charts.
